outline:
1. to pour, run, flow, pour down
    1. (Niphal)
      1. to be poured, be spilt
      2. to pour oneself, flow, trickle
      3. to vanish (fig.)
      4. to be stretched out
    2. (Hiphil) to pour down
    3. (Hophal) to melt
kjv_def: fall, flow away, pour down (out), run, shed, spilt, trickle down.
strongs_def: to flow; figuratively, to stretch out; causatively, to pour out or down; figuratively, to deliver over
